sentence: Wait, did you really forget about your child? How can you forget about a child?
Poor Gabriel is probably [shake rate=5 level=10] shaking [/shake] right now. What if he is crying now?
When will I have kids? Probably never, why do you ask?
Why are you driving so fast, do you really hurry to do something... [color=red]bloody[/color]?
No? Just my imagination? I see...
Sometimes I wonder if there is any reason behind us driving. Why do we move forward?
Driving slow like a turtle? Are we really going to reach your house at this speed?
I think you are just to paranoid right now. Relax and let the car go.
Come on, pick up the pace! We are going to be late at this rate!
Are you sure we are going in the right direction? It seems like we are just moving forward...
Seems like the road just goes on endlessly.
I will give you a quest, drive over one of the animals and you will get a prize.
The prize may be nothing more than my gratitude, but it also matters, right?
Why are you doing this to me. This is almost like torture.
They are just running in front of you... just [color=red]run over[/color] one, please.
Are you mad?! Are you trying to kill us?!
Are
Are
Are
I wonder if all these people are going to have fun today
